sectionOne.title: Let's bring your project to life

sectionThree.name: About Our Company
sectionThree.text: We are a trusted IT partner for over 40 businesses in Uzbekistan, Kazakhstan, Belarus, and the USA. We provide unique IT solutions by forming specialized teams of project managers, business analysts, UI/UX designers, DevOps engineers, backend, and frontend developers for each project!

cardOne.title: Web Applications
cardOne.text: Developing web platforms of any complexity, corporate websites, and online stores to increase your sales.

cardTwo.title: ERP/CRM Systems
cardTwo.text: IT systems of any complexity delivered in a short time. CRM, ERP, SaaS, E-Learning, E-commerce, POS, Warehouse, SMS.

cardThree.title: Mobile Applications
cardThree.text: We create innovative and functional user interfaces for mobile apps that your users will love!

cardFour.title: UX/UI Design
cardFour.text: We craft unique UI/UX designs that boost user engagement and loyalty with visually compelling solutions.

cardFive.title: MVP for Startups
cardFive.text: Working with startups, we quickly test ideas with minimal resources, scale them effectively, and bring them to market!

cardSix.title: IT Consultation
cardSix.text: We build applications of varying complexity, from social networks to marketplaces and dating platforms.

sectionSix.title: Need an expert evaluation for your project?

cardOne.title: Transparency
cardOne.text: Ardent is a company founded on the principles of openness and trust. We work with our clients and partners based on honesty, which helps strengthen strong partnerships and long-term trust.

cardTwo.title: Speed
cardTwo.text: Time is the most valuable resource! The Ardent team helps our clients achieve outstanding results by completing projects on time and at the highest level. Fast and high-quality service is the foundation of our success!

cardThree.title: Innovation
cardThree.text: We are always striving to create the future. The Ardent team implements technological innovations in practice, meeting the needs of our clients with an unconventional and unlimited approach.

cardFour.title: Thoroughness
cardFour.text: Every project is as important to us as a piece of art. The Ardent team pays attention to even the smallest details and offers unique and effective solutions for every project.

cardFive.title: Challenges
cardFive.text: Challenges are new opportunities for us. Ardent solves the most complex problems with a creative and strategic approach, expanding the horizons of possibilities for our clients.

cardSix.title: Growth
cardSix.text: Our mission is to turn our clients' goals into reality. Ardent not only supports their growth but also serves as a reliable partner along the way. Together, every idea becomes a great achievement!

formElement.title: Do you have an idea to bring to life? Let's discuss it!

cardOne.name: Jasur Meliboyev
cardOne.text: Our team's frontend development specialist. A leader in creating modern and user-friendly interfaces. His excellent knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript brings new life to every project.

cardTwo.name: Ozodbek Xolturayev
cardTwo.text: A paragon of professionalism in backend development. Ensures high security and stability on the server side in our team. Possesses extensive experience in databases and API integration.

cardThree.name: Azizbrek Sadullayev
cardThree.text: A specialist in developing Telegram bots. Offers solutions ranging from simple automation to complex systems. Responsible for our team's innovative chatbot solutions.

cardFour.name: Abdullaev Jamshid
cardFour.text: A creative leader in design. Deeply understands user needs and creates intuitive and attractive interfaces. His designs add uniqueness to every project.

cardFive.name: Temur Madraximov
cardFive.text: A master of visual content and brand identity. Strives for perfection in creating logos, banners, and marketing materials. Helps enrich every project aesthetically.

cardSix.name: MuhammadMustafo Eshchanov
cardSix.text: Our team's frontend development specialist. A leader in creating modern and user-friendly interfaces. His excellent knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript brings new life to every project.

footer.text: We are leaders in providing IT solutions for business!

informationPage.name: ABOUT THE PROJECT
informationPage.text1: Ardent Soft created a seamless online ordering platform for Uzbekistan's leading fast food company, Feed Up, enhancing customer experience and operational efficiency.
informationPage.text2: Ardent Soft created a seamless online ordering platform for Uzbekistan's leading fast food company, Tsukiyomi, enhancing customer experience and operational efficiency.
informationPage.text3: Ardent Soft created a seamless online ordering platform for Uzbekistan's leading fast food company, Elithouse, enhancing customer experience and operational efficiency.
